Generated Narrative: ValueSet ChlamydiaCodes

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    CodeDisplay
    A56.0Chlamydial infection of lower genitourinary tract
    A56.2Chlamydial infection of genitourinary tract, unspecified
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    236683007Chlamydial urethritis
    186729003Chlamydial infection of lower genitourinary tract
